metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3807 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue has been found in PowerDNS Recursor versions 4.1.x before 4.1.9 where records in the answer section of responses received from authoritative servers with the AA flag not set were not properly validated, allowing an attacker to bypass DNSSEC validation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3807` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdns-recursor - 4.1.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.9-1').
